title: About the SaRa Institute
text:
SaRa is a leading center of data science learning, teaching and research in India.
Jai Bhim!! Namo Buddhay!!
SaRa is a non-governmental and nonprofit organisation consisting of the Institute of data science, its divisions, departments and faculties.
On 05 April 2023, SaRa Institute was founded by Dr.¬†Ajay Koli and Dr.¬†Kiran Koli. We are inspired by Dalit, Adivasi, and Bahujan leaders of social democracy and justice. SaRa Institute of Data Science is a tribute to Savitribai Phule and Rambai Ambedkar. SaRa is formed as ‚ÄúSA‚Äù taken from Savitrimai and ‚ÄúRA‚Äù from Ramai.
SaRa Institute provides free education to each and every student. Most of our students are first generation learners who come from non-English medium humble rural backgrounds. We teach students almost for a year which help them:
We conduct research projects to give hands-on data training to our students. We are in the process, more information soon.
We meet our expenses from the donations received from community members. We are sincerely thankful to our donors. Soon, we will also share about our future goals and plans.

title: About the SaRa Institute
section: Dr.¬†Ajay Kumar Koli, PhD | Founder and Executive Director |
text:
Dr.¬†Ajay Kumar Koli, PhD | Founder and Executive Director | 

‚ÄúCultivation of mind should be the ultimate aim of human existence.‚Äù - Babasaheb Dr.¬†B. R. Ambedkar

I am a first-generation Ph.D.¬†scholar hailing from a Scheduled Caste (SC) background in India. With great pride, I introduce the Savitribai Ramabai Institute of Data Science (SaRa Institute), a project close to my heart aimed at bringing data science education to the underrepresented segments of India. My teaching toolkit comprises R and RStudio, enabling me to make data science education an accessible and engaging experience.
Education, to me, is the beacon that awakens individuals, fostering a profound sense of agency and a determination to confront the injustices that persist in our society. In my roles as an educator, I impart this sense of awakening to my students, encouraging them to advocate for a dignified existence. I teach Research Methodology (RM) and Data Science (DS) with a passion that empowers my students to apply their classroom knowledge to decipher both the everyday challenges and complex global issues like climate change, casteism, and racism.
Teaching, for me, is a journey of pure joy, mutual learning, and spirited debate. I craft my lectures to ignite the same enthusiasm in my students, transforming the process of acquiring new knowledge into an exciting adventure. Prior to delving into a new topic, I seek swift feedback from my students about previous lectures. I also recap prior lessons and provide an overview of the current lecture‚Äôs place within the course, helping students prepare for what lies ahead.
Recognizing that some students may initially hesitate to participate in classroom discussions, I offer them the time and space to build a connection with the course material. I warmly invite them to reach out via email or during office hours, valuing the importance of education, classroom inclusivity, and respectful professional relationships. I remain committed to ensuring that no student faces discrimination, be it direct or indirect, based on their gender, color, religion, or caste. As each lecture concludes, I take it upon myself to ensure that the students leave with both a sense of accomplishment and anticipation, sporting smiles in eager anticipation of our next enriching session.

title: About the SaRa Institute
section: Dr.¬†Kiran Lata Koli, PhD | Founder and Director |
text:
Dr.¬†Kiran Lata Koli, PhD | Founder and Director | 

‚ÄúI measure the progress of a community with the degree of progress women have achieved.‚Äù - Babasaheb Dr.¬†B. R. Ambedkar

I am Dr.¬†Kiran Lata Koli, and I am proud to introduce SaRa Institute of Data Science, our heartfelt initiative to empower underrepresented students across India. My academic journey includes a PhD in Dairy Chemistry from the prestigious Indian Council of Agricultural Research - National Dairy Research Institute, located in Karnal, Haryana. Furthermore, I hold an M.Sc. in Food Technology from Guru Jambheshwar University of Science & Technology, Hisar, Haryana. My dedication to knowledge is evident in my qualification for the ASRB ‚Äì NET in Food Technology.
With over three years of teaching experience at both undergraduate and postgraduate levels, I have had the privilege of educating students in various aspects of Food Technology across different universities. Additionally, I have played a pivotal role in guiding and supervising numerous undergraduate and postgraduate students through their major dissertation projects.
My journey in academia extends to two years of invaluable research experience at the National Dairy Research Institute in Karnal, Haryana. During this time, I have made significant contributions to peer-reviewed journals with publications that have been recognized with awards for the best research paper, best review paper, and best poster presentations.
I am driven by a profound desire to give back to society by channeling my wealth of teaching and research experience to educate and empower the aspiring minds of India.

title: News and Events
text:
01 October 2023, Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan, Sonipat
Dear President and committee members of the Ambedkar Educational Society Sonipat, we wanted to extend our heartfelt gratitude for your generosity in providing us with free space in the Dr.¬†Ambedkar Bhawan to educate underrepresented students in India. Your support is not just appreciated; it is truly a beacon of hope and opportunity.
Your belief in our mission to empower those who have historically been underprivileged is invaluable. It is thanks to partners like you that we can create a more inclusive and equitable educational landscape in our country.










The free space you have provided is not just a physical location; it is a place where dreams are nurtured, where aspirations take flight, and where the future of countless students is being transformed for the better.
Your contribution goes far beyond bricks and mortar; it is an investment in the potential and promise of these students, and it will undoubtedly lead to a brighter, more promising future for them and our nation as a whole.
Once again, thank you for your unwavering support and for being a crucial part of our journey to make education accessible to all. Together, we are making a profound difference in the lives of countless underrepresented students.
With deep gratitude,
Ajay Koli & Kiran Koli

https://forms.gle/QhFEjzPqWqt1tdtL9



 Benefits of learning data science
On 1 Aug 2023, as per ChatGPT, the benefits of learning data science are:
‚ÄúLearning data science offers numerous benefits, as it is a multidisciplinary field that combines statistics, programming, and domain expertise to extract valuable insights from data. Here are some of the key benefits of learning data science:

High Demand and Career Opportunities: Data science is one of the fastest-growing fields with a high demand for skilled professionals. Learning data science can open up various career opportunities in industries like technology, finance, healthcare, marketing, and more.
Solving Real-World Problems: Data science allows you to analyze and interpret data to solve complex real-world problems. It empowers you to make data-driven decisions that can lead to improved business processes, increased efficiency, and better outcomes.
Competitive Advantage: In today‚Äôs data-driven world, organizations that can leverage data effectively gain a competitive advantage. Data science skills can help you stand out in the job market and make you an asset to any organization.
Lucrative Salaries: Data scientists are in high demand, and as a result, they often receive attractive compensation packages and competitive salaries.
Innovation and Insights: Data science enables you to discover patterns, trends, and insights that might not be apparent to others. This can lead to innovative solutions and strategies that drive business growth.
Continuous Learning: Data science is an evolving field with new tools, techniques, and technologies being developed regularly. Learning data science ensures that you are continuously growing and adapting to the latest trends.
Cross-Industry Applicability: Data science skills are transferable across various industries. Whether you‚Äôre interested in finance, healthcare, e-commerce, or any other sector, data science can be applied to derive value from data in different contexts.
Personal Development: Learning data science often involves improving your analytical, problem-solving, and programming skills, which can contribute to your personal and intellectual growth.
Contribution to Society: Data science can be used for social good, such as in healthcare analytics, disaster response, and environmental monitoring. It allows you to make a positive impact on society by addressing critical issues.
Flexibility in Work Environment: Many data science roles offer flexibility in work arrangements, such as remote work options, freelance opportunities, and consulting projects.

Overall, learning data science equips you with valuable skills that are in demand, foster personal growth, and provide opportunities to contribute meaningfully to various industries and society as a whole.‚Äù

title: List of courses
text: ‚ÄúWaiting for a Visa‚Äù artwork by Malvika Raj.

title: List of courses
text:
1. R For Beginners

I began my data science journey with R language. To know more about my journey as a data science teacher please visit the website of my course ‚ÄúR for Beginners‚Äù. R is programming language. R project website defines it as ‚Äúa language and environment for statistical computing and graphics‚Äù. R is very famous for its accurate statistical analysis and elegant graphics. It is equally powerful for developing Shiny apps.
We will be following the online book R for Data Science. Each chapter will be covered including the exercises. Using this book we will be covering data science framework, data Visualization, data cleaning, quarto for making slides, websites, thesis, and reports.

title: List of courses
text:
2. Basics of Statistics

Learning statistics is one of the most important part of data science. We will be ‚Äúdiscovering‚Äù statistics using the book from one of the most respected researchers in the field, PROF. ANDY FIELD & HIS CAT PROF. MILTON üò∫
Using this book we will be exploring the following topics:
Why you need science; reporting research, variables and measurement; summarizing data; fitting models (central tendency); presenting data; z-scores; probability; inferential statistics; robust estimation; hypothesis testing; modern approaches to theory testing; assumptions; relationships (correlation); the general linear model; comparing two means; comparing several means; factorial designs.

title: List of courses
text:
3. Research Methods
Academics or industry this course will be extremely helpful for you to evolve critical research thinking. We will be following three books:











Codes execute what you think; however what you think depends on how you view a specific issue. Research methodology helps us think critically about problems and questions; it teaches us how to find earlier or other possible solutions in an ocean of information. It also trains us how to use scientific methods to do analysis and reporting of the results without biases and following the ethics.

title: SUPPORT US
text:
Teach Our Students:

You can take online/offline sessions for our students as per your data science expertise.
You can also help our student with English reading, writing, and speaking.
You can also give a talk to sensitize students about the current world affairs.
Caste sensitization, motivational, and personality development lectures.

title: SUPPORT US
text:
Donate For Our Students:

You can buy books for us. Click to see our Amazon book wishlist.
Most of our students cannot afford laptops. You can donate used/new laptops. It will help our students to attend coding lab sessions more effectively.
You can also donate money to support our cause.

SaRa Institute is a not-for-profit educational institution dedicated to providing quality education and fostering intellectual growth in a nurturing and inclusive environment. We are driven by a vision to empower individuals from all walks of life with knowledge, skills, and values that prepare them for a successful and fulfilling future.
SaRa stands for ‚ÄúSavitribai Ramabai Institute of Data Science‚Äù. Established with a mission to make education accessible to everyone, SaRa Institute has been committed to delivering excellence in education since its inception. As a not-for-profit college, our primary focus is on providing a transformative learning experience rather than maximizing profits. We believe that education is a powerful tool that can break barriers, create opportunities, and drive positive change in society.
We invite you to be a part of the SaRa family and embark on a transformative educational journey that will shape your future and empower you to make a positive impact on society. Explore our website to learn more about our programs, facilities, and the enriching experiences that await you at SaRa Institute.
We need your love üíô and support. Come and join us as we embrace the power of education to make a difference and build a brighter tomorrow together. Please feel free to contact us at

sara.institute.info@gmail.com
